short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple tool that helps people save and organize links for research purposes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension that helps people quickly save, classify and organize links for study and research.

I created it because I needed a quick way to see what links on a page have been visited, what pages I haven't finished reading and what has been read already. Bookmarks are too complicated and browsers use to remove the history of visited links after a while. With this extension I made sure that doesn't happen and marking links is super quick.

I intent to add more features and improve existing ones. Feedback and support is more than welcome.
